title: Technical Chinese e-Learning: Multimedia-Based Beginner Practical Course

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of at least 50 basic Chinese characters and foundational understanding of scientific terminology
context.additional_context: A real-time feedback-enabled environment using digital devices, supplemented by weekly online mentoring sessions.

learning_goals: Accurate pronunciation and contextual comprehension of 200 core technical vocabulary items through situational audio/video content
Cultivation of proficiency in applying 10 types of Chinese templates for explaining scientific experiment procedures
Analysis of similarities/differences between technical terms using multimedia learning tools to produce comparative reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
